list_definition.definition: (in a business organization etc) concerned with management
concerned with the carrying out of laws etc
the branch of the government that puts the laws into effect.
a person or body of people in an organization etc that has power to direct or manage

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He is an executive in an insurance company.
